channel.title: Plan on Forest Garden Wales
channel.description: Recent content in Plan on Forest Garden Wales
channel.copyright: This work is dual-licensed under MIT & GPL v3

item.title: Lockdown Livestream, launch of free mini-course
item.author: hello@growdigital.org (Jake Rayson)
item.description: I’m revamping my free mini-course, all about creating a forest garden plan. Firstly, it’s been renamed Backyard Forest and rewritten, to appeal to people with not-large gardens.

item.title: Nutrients
item.author: hello@growdigital.org (Jake Rayson)
item.description: The aim is to have your forest garden as a ecosystem, so that it doesn’t rely on any external inputs for fertility, water or pest control.

item.title: Measure with triangles
item.author: hello@growdigital.org (Jake Rayson)
item.description: First off, a disclaimer. I’m shit at maths. Luckily, there’s clever people and the internet.

item.title: Creating a forest garden plan with a satellite background image
item.author: hello@growdigital.org (Jake Rayson)
item.description: Using a CAD plan, it’s easy to move trees around to try out different ideas.

item.title: Forest garden CAD photo
item.author: hello@growdigital.org (Jake Rayson)
item.description: I discovered how to easily scale a satellite photo in QCAD to create a #ForestGarden plan.

item.title: Forest garden plan
item.author: hello@growdigital.org (Jake Rayson)
item.description: This is the latest version of the forest garden plan for what is unaffectionately known as Forest Garden One (I had a mental block with names that day).

item.title: Ornamental Forest Garden plan
item.author: hello@growdigital.org (Jake Rayson)
item.description: The Ornamental Forest Garden (OFG) plan is based on a satellite photo, so it should be more accurate than the Forest Garden One, which is based on a digital Ordnance Survey map.

item.title: Now offering remote forest garden design service!
item.author: hello@growdigital.org (Jake Rayson)
item.description: “I’m just delighted with the plan! It’s everything I wanted and much more.
